00020 float ekin(float edep, float dthick)
00021 {
00022    const float cp0[4] = {-0.5174     , 0.4172      , 0.3610E-02  , -0.1286E-05};
00023    const float cp1[4] = {1.0000      , 0.8703E-02  , 0.1252E-04  , 0.6948E-07};
00024    const float cp2[4] = {0.2990E-05  , -0.7937E-05 , -0.2219E-07 , -0.2877E-09};
00025    const float cp3[4] = {-0.8258E-08 , 0.4031E-08  , 0.9673E-12  , 0.3661E-12};
00026    const float cp4[4] = {0.3652E-11  , -0.8652E-12 , 0.4059E-14  , -0.1294E-15};
00027 
00028    float d2 = dthick * dthick;
00029    float d3 = d2 * dthick;
00030 
00031    float pp[5];
00032 
00033    pp[0] = cp0[0] + cp0[1]*dthick + cp0[2]*d2 + cp0[3]*d3;
00034    pp[1] = cp1[0] + cp1[1]*dthick + cp1[2]*d2 + cp1[3]*d3;
00035    pp[2] = cp2[0] + cp2[1]*dthick + cp2[2]*d2 + cp2[3]*d3;
00036    pp[3] = cp3[0] + cp3[1]*dthick + cp3[2]*d2 + cp3[3]*d3;
00037    pp[4] = cp4[0] + cp4[1]*dthick + cp4[2]*d2 + cp4[3]*d3;
00038 
00039    float edep2 = edep * edep;
00040    float edep3 = edep2 * edep;
00041    float edep4 = edep3 * edep;
00042 
00043    return pp[0] + pp[1]*edep + pp[2]*edep2 + pp[3]*edep3 + pp[4]*edep4;
00044 }

00046 
00059 void KinemaReconstruction(processEvent *event, recordConfigRhicStruct *gConfigInfo,
00060                      int chId, float &edepo, float &e, float &t, float &delt, float &Mass)
00061 {
00062   float rand1 = (float)rand()/(float)RAND_MAX;
00063   float rand2 = (float)rand()/(float)RAND_MAX;
00064 
00065   // Deposited energy
00066   edepo = gConfigInfo->data.chan[chId-1].acoef * (event->amp+rand2-0.5);
00067 
00068   // ToF in [ns]
00069   t = gRunConsts[chId].Ct * (event->tdc + rand1 - 0.5) - gConfigInfo->data.chan[chId-1].t0 - gAsymAnaInfo->tshift;
00070 
00071   // Kinetic energy assuming Carbon
00072   e = ekin(edepo, gConfigInfo->data.chan[chId-1].dwidth);
00073 
00074   // Decrepancy between observed ToF and calculated t from energy
00075   delt = t - gRunConsts[chId].E2T/sqrt(e);
00076 }
00077 
00078 }
